## Where I've Been

- Graduated from the [University of California, San Diego](https://ucsd.edu/) in 2012 with a Bachelor of Science in Neuroscience & Physiology 

- Graduated from UC San Diego [Skaggs School of Pharmacy & Pharmaceutical Sciences](https://pharmacy.ucsd.edu/) in 2016 with a Doctor of Pharmacy (PharmD) degree

- Completed a two-year post-doctoral fellowship in 2018 in Health Economics & Outcomes Research, also from UC San Diego [Skaggs School of Pharmacy & Pharmaceutical Sciences](https://pharmacy.ucsd.edu/)

- Started a Master's Degree in 2019 Clinical Research from the [University of California, San Diego](https://ucsd.edu/) (anticipated graduation date: June 2023)

- Started my career in health economics and outcomes research at [BD](https://www.bd.com/en-us) in 2018 

- Joined the faculty at UC Irvine [School of Pharmacy & Pharmaceutical Sciences](https://pharmsci.uci.edu/)

## Where I Am Now 

- Assistant Professor of Clinical Pharmacy Practice  at UC Irvine [School of Pharmacy & Pharmaceutical Sciences](https://pharmsci.uci.edu/)
